login.title: Sign in to your account
login.subtitle: Enter your credentials to access your dashboard
login.redirecting: You are being redirected to your main page...

home.welcome: Welcome to Your Inventory Management System
home.description: Streamline your inventory operations with our comprehensive management solution. Track, analyze, and optimize your inventory in real-time.

features.title: Key Features
features.inventoryDesc: Real-time tracking of all your inventory items with detailed stock levels, locations, and movement history.
features.analyticsDesc: Comprehensive analytics and reporting tools to help you make data-driven decisions about your inventory.
features.usersDesc: Role-based access control to manage your team's permissions and access to different features.
features.settingsDesc: Flexible configuration options to tailor the system to your specific business needs.
features.alertsDesc: Automated notifications for low stock levels, expiring items, and other important inventory events.
features.performanceDesc: Track key performance indicators to optimize your inventory management and reduce costs.
features.securityDesc: Advanced security measures to protect your inventory data and business operations.
features.updatesDesc: Instant updates across all devices to ensure everyone has access to the latest inventory information.

home.setupInventoryDesc: Begin by adding your products and setting up your initial inventory levels.
home.configureSettingsDesc: Customize your preferences and set up alerts for important inventory events.
home.inviteTeamDesc: Add team members and assign roles to start collaborating on inventory management.

dashboardOverview.welcomeTitle: Welcome to Your Inventory Management System
dashboardOverview.welcomeDesc: Streamline your inventory operations with our comprehensive management solution. Track, analyze, and optimize your inventory in real-time.
dashboardOverview.inventoryTrackingDesc: Real-time tracking of all your inventory items with detailed stock levels, locations, and movement history.
dashboardOverview.analyticsDashboardDesc: Comprehensive analytics and reporting tools to help you make data-driven decisions about your inventory.
dashboardOverview.userManagementDesc: Role-based access control to manage your team's permissions and access to different features.
dashboardOverview.customizableSettingsDesc: Flexible configuration options to tailor the system to your specific business needs.
dashboardOverview.stockAlertsDesc: Automated notifications for low stock levels, expiring items, and other important inventory events.
dashboardOverview.performanceMetricsDesc: Track key performance indicators to optimize your inventory management and reduce costs.
dashboardOverview.securityFeaturesDesc: Advanced security measures to protect your inventory data and business operations.
dashboardOverview.realTimeUpdatesDesc: Instant updates across all devices to ensure everyone has access to the latest inventory information.
dashboardOverview.step1Desc: Begin by adding your products and setting up your initial inventory levels.
dashboardOverview.step2Desc: Customize your preferences and set up alerts for important inventory events.
dashboardOverview.step3Desc: Add team members and assign roles to start collaborating on inventory management.
